subject: Greetings
body:
Greetings.

I am, Mr, Andrew Joes, A banker of one of Bank here in Ghana West Africa.
Please can you be reliable and honest to handle a very confidential
transaction, which involves transfer of a huge sum of money for future
INVESTMENT in your country. A foreigner (LATE NAZIR ADAM AHMAD) an oil
Merchant /contractor, before his sudden death  due to (Corona-virus
disease)  deposited with my bank the sum of USD$10.2M: which, I
successfully kept with instruction that it MUST be released to his
BENEFICIARY.

Now, our bank is expecting the money to be claimed by the beneficiary as
instructed. Though many efforts had been made to get in touch with any
direct relative but all to no avail, because of that, some board of
directors wants us to confiscate the money or declare it Bank's money soon.

This is why; I seek for your permission to PRESENT YOU as his BENEFICIARY
so that the fund USD$10.2M would be transfer into your bank account for
future INVESTMENT in your country. I KNOW HE IS NOT YOUR RELATION  BUT THE
ENTIRE DOCUMENT WILL BE PERFECTED TO YOUR NAME TO SUIT YOUR STAND AS THE
BENEFICIARY.I am assuring you 100% free from any risk in this transaction.

Finally, your share would be 40% of $10.2m. While 10% would be mapped out
to settle ALL expenses while the balance 50% is for me, which I will also
invest in your country via your assistance.

Kinds regard

Mr. Andrew Joes

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Joes,

Thank you for reaching out to me with such an interesting proposition. I must say, it's not every day that one gets a message like this! 

I'm curious about the details of this arrangement. How exactly would the process work? And how did you come across my name as a potential partner in this endeavor?

Also, could you tell me more about the late Nazir Adam Ahmad? It sounds like he was quite a successful individual.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Janice

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Joes,

Thank you for reaching out to me with such an interesting proposition. I must say, it's not every day that one receives a message like this! 

I'm curious about the details of this arrangement. How exactly would the process work? And how did you come across my contact information? 

Also, could you please provide more information about the late Nazir Adam Ahmad? It's quite a sad story and I'd like to know more about him.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Janice

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
I must sincerely assure you that nothing illegal will happen in this
business either now or later, I cannot afford to involve myself in
something that is not legal even if is involves Millions of dollars because
I am a God fearing man, so I want you to be rest-assured that everything
have already worked out once you follow my instructions and advice.

This is not a regular business that comes and goes, it is a God's sent
opportunity and such opportunity usually comes once in a lifetime. Your
security is 100% guaranteed, be sure that everything will be successful, I
want your full cooperation from your side and I will do the same from this
side to ensure that all arrangements here are perfectly in order, so don't
be worried or curious for any reason. I contacted you with faith hoping and
believing in God that you will not betray me once the fund is transferred
to your account.


You should know that I am not doing this business because of the large
amount that is involved on it but rather the success of this business will
benefit both families from generation to generation as far as you follow
the instruction which I will be getting from our Insider in Bank's head
office who is the main KEY to success of this transaction, and you should
know that never a business to succeed without building trust to each other.
I promise you that I will never let you down in this business either now or
in the future and you assure me that as well. In fact, I am very much
interested to know whether you will be capable of doing this business with
me in full confidence.


I will apply for release of the fund on your behalf with your account
details, this will enable the Bank to process the payment officially to
your account and foreign exchange Approval will be issued in your name by
the National Treasury Department Of Finance in your favor legalizing the
transfer to your name as sole inheritor so that your Government or your
Bank will not question about source\origin of the Fund as the National
Treasury Department Of Finance has already Legalized and Authorize the
Transfer under the backup cover of repatriation of earning, investing
scheme.


You should also send me your account information where you want the fund to
be transferred. If you can be fast, the Transfer will be concluded within 7
banking days but you should keep the business to yourself as top secret
because success of this transaction is highly confidential. You should not
tell your bank that money is coming to your account for now because they
can ask you early questions you may not be able to answer. I will tell you
what and when to tell your bank with all the necessary documents to back up
the source and origin of the fund as legitimate funds from genuine sources.
Below is the data needed from you for processing the payment on your name


Bank account details in full......................

1. Bank name:..................

2. Account name:...................

3. Account number:..............

4. Bank address:..............

5. Swift code:......

6. IBAN number.....

7. Attachment copy of your international passport or driver's license


It doesn't matter whether there is money in your bank account or not
because an empty existing bank account can still serve the purpose.


Thanks.

Mr. Andrew

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining this business opportunity in such detail. It sounds like a unique venture, indeed! I must admit, I'm not the sharpest tool in the shed when it comes to these things, but your explanation makes it sound quite interesting.

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind me asking. You mentioned that this is a God-sent opportunity - how did you come across it? Also, could you elaborate on the role of the Insider at the Bank's head office? 

As for my bank account details and personal identification, I'm afraid I can't share those over email due to security reasons. But perhaps we could discuss other ways to proceed with this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Janice

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Only the bank insider at the head office can confirm you as the
beneficiary so this is their role. As for your bank details. you can send
it here or you can send it to my whatsapp number.  Once i have your contact
number i will say hi to you on whatsapp.

Please, what I need from you is your Sincerely and honestly.

Thanks.

Mr. Andrew

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about the role of a bank insider at the head office. Could you tell me more about what they do? 

As for my bank details, I'm afraid I can't share them with you. But I'd be happy to continue our conversation here or on WhatsApp. Could you tell me more about why you need my contact number?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Janice

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Greetings,

Please let me answer all your questions so that we can proceed in this
deal. The late Nazir Adam Ahmad was a gold dealer here in Ghana, he had a
contract with the Ghana government on gold buying. and also contract with
some local mining company which he uses our bank to pay them after dealing
with them.

The covered documents are the documents that cover this transaction here
and in your country which will verify the transaction is legal.

Please if you are willing to work with me kindly send me the information I
requested from you to enable us to proceed.

Thanks.

Mr. Andrew

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's fascinating to learn about the late Nazir Adam Ahmad and his gold dealings in Ghana. I'm curious, how did he manage to secure contracts with both the government and local mining companies? 

You mentioned some covered documents that would verify legality here and in my country. Could you please elaborate on what these documents are? 

I'm eager to continue our conversation, but I must remind you that I can't provide any personal information at this time.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Janice

subject: Re: Greetings
body:

Could you please elaborate more on these covered documents? What exactly do they entail and how do they ensure legality in both countries?

Also, could you provide more information about the local mining companies that Mr. Ahmad had contracts with? How did these contracts work?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Janice
